ResumeParserData.Summary: Emma Johnson is a seasoned Product Manager with three decades of experience in the UK banking sector. With a strong mathematical background and a passion for innovation, she has successfully led product development for some of the country's most prestigious banks. Emma excels at driving business growth and enhancing customer experiences. She is eager to contribute her expertise to a dynamic organization.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Emma has an experience in the domain of 'Management of Companies and Enterprises', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Marketing and Sales Managers. The candidate has been working as a Product Manager at Santander UK for the last 7.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary:
Currently, Emma holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Santander UK. from 01/01/2017 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 7.7 years in this company.

Emma holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Nationwide Building Society. from 01/01/2011 to 31/12/2017. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

Emma holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at Halifax Bank. from 01/01/2005 to 31/12/2011. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

Emma holds a Mid Management Level position, as Product Manager at NatWest Bank. from 01/01/1999 to 31/12/2005. The candidate has a total experience of 7.0 years in this company.

ResumeParserData.DetailResume:
Emma Johnson
Address : 89 Maple Road, Manchester, England
Email : emma.johnson@example.com
Phone : 07789 345678

Personal Statement
Emma Johnson is a seasoned Product Manager with three decades of experience in the UK banking sector. With a strong mathematical background and a passion for innovation, she has successfully led product development for some of the country's most prestigious banks. Emma excels at driving business growth and enhancing customer experiences. She is eager to contribute her expertise to a dynamic organization.

Education History
University of Birmingham (Russell Group) 
BSc Mathematics
Graduated : 1994

Work History
Product Manager	,Santander UK
Manchester, UK	,2017 - Present
Led product innovation initiatives, resulting in a 25% increase in customer acquisition.
Collaborated with various departments to ensure cohesive product launches.
Product Manager	,Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK	,2011 - 2017
Managed a wide range of financial products, achieving significant revenue growth.
Implemented customer feedback mechanisms to refine product offerings.
Product Manager	,Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK	,2005 - 2011
Directed product development processes from concept to launch, ensuring market fit.
Conducted comprehensive market research to stay ahead of industry trends.
Product Manager	,NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK	,1999 - 2005
Oversaw the lifecycle of multiple banking products, driving customer satisfaction and retention.
Built strong relationships with key stakeholders to support product success.
Various Roles in Product Management	,Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK	,1994 - 1999
Gained extensive experience in product management across various notable UK banks.

Skills
Innovative Product Development
Market Research and Analysis
Team Leadership and Collaboration
Customer Relationship Management
Strategic Product Planning

Qualifications
Certified Product Manager (CPM) 
PRINCE2 Practitioner
Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP) 
Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO) 

Personal Hobbies
Photography : Enjoy capturing moments of nature and urban life.
Travel : Passionate about exploring new places and cultures.
Yoga : Regular practitioner of yoga for physical and mental well-being.
Reading : Avid reader of fiction and financial literature.
Volunteering : Involved in local environmental and community service initiatives.

ResumeParserData.HtmlResume:
Emma Johnson

Address: 89 Maple Road, Manchester, England
Email: emma.johnson@example.com
Phone: 07789 345678

Personal Statement

Emma Johnson is a seasoned Product Manager with three decades of experience in the UK banking sector. With a strong mathematical background and a passion for innovation, she has successfully led product development for some of the country's most prestigious banks. Emma excels at driving business growth and enhancing customer experiences. She is eager to contribute her expertise to a dynamic organization.

Education History

University of Birmingham (Russell Group)

  • BSc Mathematics
  • Graduated: 1994

Work History

Product Manager | Santander UK
Manchester, UK | 2017 - Present

  • Led product innovation initiatives, resulting in a 25% increase in customer acquisition.
  • Collaborated with various departments to ensure cohesive product launches.

Product Manager | Nationwide Building Society
Manchester, UK | 2011 - 2017

  • Managed a wide range of financial products, achieving significant revenue growth.
  • Implemented customer feedback mechanisms to refine product offerings.

Product Manager | Halifax Bank
Manchester, UK | 2005 - 2011

  • Directed product development processes from concept to launch, ensuring market fit.
  • Conducted comprehensive market research to stay ahead of industry trends.

Product Manager | NatWest Bank
Manchester, UK | 1999 - 2005

  • Oversaw the lifecycle of multiple banking products, driving customer satisfaction and retention.
  • Built strong relationships with key stakeholders to support product success.

Various Roles in Product Management | Various UK Banks
Manchester, UK | 1994 - 1999

  • Gained extensive experience in product management across various notable UK banks.

Skills

  • Innovative Product Development
  • Market Research and Analysis
  • Team Leadership and Collaboration
  • Customer Relationship Management
  • Strategic Product Planning

Qualifications

  • Certified Product Manager (CPM)
  • PRINCE2 Practitioner
  • Agile Certified Practitioner (PMI-ACP)
  • Lean Six Sigma Green Belt
  • Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO)

Personal Hobbies

  • Photography: Enjoy capturing moments of nature and urban life.
  • Travel: Passionate about exploring new places and cultures.
  • Yoga: Regular practitioner of yoga for physical and mental well-being.
  • Reading: Avid reader of fiction and financial literature.
  • Volunteering: Involved in local environmental and community service initiatives.
